description:
This 12.7-millimetre (half-inch) webbing is very malleable and has a small diameter -- so it’s perfect for a tie-off on aid pieces and pins. It is not as strong as runner strength webbing and is intended only for holding progression, not falls.

  • This product is sold by the metre
  • Tensile strength is 450kg
name: Gladding Braided Products 1/2" (12.7mm) Nylon Tubular Webbing
